meta_description: Discover Sedona’s Unique History. Plan Your Visit Discover Sedona’s unique history with a visit to the Sedona Heritage Museum.  Open daily 11 am to 3 pm.  Featured Exhibit Check out...
hours_text:
The Sedona Heritage Museum is located in Jordan Historical Park, 735 Jordan Road, in uptown Sedona, Arizona. Venture through the Museum’s regular exhibits highlighting our Early Settlers, Ranching & Cowboys, the Orchard Industry, movies made in Sedona and Sedona Schnebly, the town’s namesake.

## Hours & Rates

Open daily: 11:00 am- 3:00 pm  
Closed major holidays

**Adults: $10**

**Children (under 13): Free**

**Groups:**

  * We offer group rates, including self-guided and docent-led tours. Call 928-282-7038 for details.

**Can’t make it to the Museum right now? Our popular audio tour is available in our[online Gift Shop](http://web.archive.org/web/20240927074311/https://sedonamuseum.org/shop/) – play it on your own device at any time.**

## Museum Grounds

The Sedona Heritage Museum, housed in the original [Jordan family](http://web.archive.org/web/20240927074311/https://sedonamuseum.org///pioneers/) farmstead, is situated in the City of Sedona’s Jordan Historical Park, a 4.8 acre oasis in Uptown Sedona. In cooperation with the City and the Sedona Historical Society, the establishment of the Museum in 1998 fulfilled Ruth Jordan’s dream of preserving the property as an historic place.

Having a strong interest in community history, Ruth was prompted to sell her home and remaining property to the City of Sedona versus the alternative of converting it to a housing development. In 1991, via a bequest from the Stella Carruth estate, the City was able to purchase the property. ...

collections_text:
## Discover Sedona’s Unique History.

[Visit Us](/web/20260116055916/https://sedonamuseum.org/visit/)

## [Plan Your Visit](http://web.archive.org/web/20260116055916/https://sedonamuseum.org/visit/)

Discover Sedona’s unique history with a visit to the Sedona Heritage Museum. 

Open daily 11 am to 3 pm. 

## [Featured Exhibit](/web/20260116055916/https://sedonamuseum.org/exhibits/)

Check out our newest changing exhibit, “**Hiking Sedona’s History** ,” to learn about the stories behind some of Sedona’s most popular trails.

**[Add your favorite hike photos to our exhibit!](/web/20260116055916/https://sedonamuseum.org/exhibits/)**

[](http://web.archive.org/web/20260116055916/https://sedonamuseum.org/exhibits/)

The Sedona Heritage Museum hosts many events for the community ranging from Christmas in the Park to the Fall Arts & Crafts Fair!
